poem:
### Echoes of Power

In halls of discord,  
voices clash like swords;  
truth, a wavering flame  
in shadowed corridors.  
Men of once-great lands,  
entangled in their lust,  
forge chaos with their hands,  
leaving trust to rust.  
Where will this echo end,  
in whispered winds of dust?
